thread.title: IKEA’s Classic Blue Bags Are About to Look Very Different — See the New Design
thread.title_full: IKEA’s Classic Blue Bags Are About to Look Very Different — See the New Design

author: Megan Stein
title: IKEA’s Classic Blue Bags Are About to Look Very Different — See the New Design
text:
RELATED: Here’s What Your Local Target Store Could Look Like Pretty Soon 
Although the collection won’t be available in US stores until 2018, visitors lucky enough to have access to the Parisian spot can pick up the refreshed shopper (and even get one for free with the purchase of any IKEA’s Art Event collection pieces, also available at Colette) from now until May 6th. While you’re there, take note of the collaboration’s other events , including an exhibit of limited-edition posters, live performances, and a reinvention of the shop’s waterbar , which is exactly what it sounds like. 
Regardless of whether you’re excited for the reimagined design or would prefer to keep things classic, there’s no arguing that this large storage savior is an essential part of the IKEA experience. Because if you go to IKEA and don’t leave with a bag full of tea lights, did you really go at all? Show Full Article More People Logo
